author: gordon--
title: South Park
description:
The South Park plugin allows you to watch all South Park episodes via an MTV API.

The following audio languages are offered (depending on episode), descriptions are available in many other languages:
 - German
 - English
 - Polish
 - French

If there are any issues, ideas, wishes etc. visit this project on GitHub:
https://github.com/LFriede/movian-southpark
